hotels.title: Idyllic Ibiza Retreat near Cala d'Hort with Rooftop Bar and Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Experience the ethereal beauty of Ibiza from the secluded luxury of your private room or suite at this boutique oasis. Petunia exudes boho glamour with charming eateries, a sun-drenched pool dotted with loungers and an effortlessly chic vibe - perfect for soaking up the island’s unique energy. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the enchanting old town of Ibiza, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, or set sail to the idyllic island of Formentera. Back at the hotel, toast the evening with a refreshing cocktail and live music at the rooftop bar La Mirada, by Petunia and enjoy a menu offering fresh oysters and delicious bites. For those seeking relaxation, the outdoor pool, wellness classes and a tranquil massage cabin provide a serene sanctuary for unwinding.
